script.name: al.Phanon.Tick
script.description: LitQB's Phanon Corporation: Main timer routine

line.comment: * al engine: set plugin $plugin.ID timer interval to 180 s
* al engine: set plugin $plugin.ID timer interval to 15 s
* All Plugin Variables are explained in the MAIN routine.
* Final formula will be BASE + .GENERATION x MULTIPLIER.
* NextGenerationWait has to be 2 to start us off. 1 is too low, as 1 is the trigger for building the new station
* We're waiting for another generation to appear
* If Corporation HQ isn't built and the plugin is running, we build one.
* Check to see if the current subsidary is failing
* GOOD TO GO, PHANON CORP LIVES
* display subtitle text: text=$Text duration=5000 ms

sval.val: LitQB's Phanon Corporation: Main timer routine
Time: %s Low: %s Medium: %s Buy: %s Station Hauler: %s
al engine: set plugin $plugin.ID timer interval to 180 s
al engine: set plugin $plugin.ID timer interval to 15 s
All Plugin Variables are explained in the MAIN routine.
Final formula will be BASE + .GENERATION x MULTIPLIER.
NextGenerationWait has to be 2 to start us off. 1 is too low, as 1 is the trigger for building the new station
We're waiting for another generation to appear
If Corporation HQ isn't built and the plugin is running, we build one.
Check to see if the current subsidary is failing
GOOD TO GO, PHANON CORP LIVES
display subtitle text: text=$Text duration=5000 ms
